labels.analysis: The SkySQL MCP Server is primarily focused on managing and interacting with SkySQL (MySQL/MariaDB) database instances. Its core functionality revolves around launching, monitoring, and executing SQL queries on serverless database instances, as well as managing credentials and IP allowlists. Additionally, it provides tools to interact with AI-powered database agents, indicating a fusion of database operations with AI capabilities.
labels.reasoning: The primary label "Database Operations" is chosen because the server's core functionality revolves around managing and querying databases. The secondary label "AI/ML Tools" is selected due to the integration with AI-powered database agents, and "API Integration" is included since the server acts as an interface for managing database services programmatically. No custom label is necessary as the server's functionality is well-covered by the predefined categories.

remote_server_response.error: unhandled errors in a TaskGroup (1 sub-exception)

server_info_crawled.name: SkySQL MCP Server
server_info_crawled.author: @skysqlinc/skysql-mcp
server_info_crawled.overview:
Set up the SkySQL MCP server, which provides a powerful interface for managing SkySQL (MySQL/MariaDB) database instances and interacting with SkyAI Agents.

Features
Launch and manage serverless MariaDB database instances
Interact with AI-powered database agents
Execute SQL queries directly on SkySQL (MySQL/MariaDB) instances
Manage database credentials and IP allowlists
List and monitor database services

tools.name: list_agents
tools.description: Deploy Server SkySQL MCP Server @skysqlinc/skysql-mcp Try in Playground list_agents

tools.name: launch_serverless_db
tools.description: Launch a new Serverless DB instance in SkySQL

tools.name: delete_db
tools.description: Delete a DB instance from SkySQL

tools.name: ask_agent
tools.description: Ask a question to a specific DB agent

tools.name: get_db_credentials
tools.description: Get the credentials for a SkySQL database instance

tools.name: update_ip_allowlist
tools.description: Update the IP allowlist for a SkySQL database instance with the current IP

tools.name: list_services
tools.description: List all available SkySQL database services

tools.name: execute_sql
tools.description: Execute SQL query on a SkySQL database instance and return the results

server_info_crawled.python_sdk:
import mcp
from mcp.client.streamable_http import streamablehttp_client
import json
import base64

smithery_api_key = ""
url = f"https://server.smithery.ai/@skysqlinc/skysql-mcp/mcp?api_key={smithery_api_key}"

async def main():
    # Connect to the server using HTTP client
    async with streamablehttp_client(url) as (read_stream, write_stream, _):
        async with mcp.ClientSession(read_stream, write_stream) as session:
            # Initialize the connection
            await session.initialize()
            # List available tools
            tools_result = await session.list_tools()
            print(f"Available tools: {', '.join([t.name for t in tools_result.tools])}")

if __name__ == "__main__":
    import asyncio
    asyncio.run(main())
